divs: sighting detailsi had just sat down on my couch at around 9:30 pm and looked out of my window and saw 5 yellowish-orange lights in sort of a line formation with no sound and no blinking lights.i was in the richland\elton area of johnstown and i see airport traffic all the time but this was nothing like any airport traffic that i had seen before in fact they were not heading anywhere near the airport. i watched them for about5 minutes until one by one they started to fade until they all disappeared. the sky was clear so they didnt disappear into the clouds.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Johnstown
There were no other sightings in Johnstown on or around August 8th 2012
Summary: I saw 5 unknown objects in a line type formation which faded and disappeared after about 4-5 minutes with no sound at all.
